Package net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.standard

package net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.standard
Built-in tags shipped with MiniMessage.

The tags in StandardTags will be included in MiniMessage instances by default.

Since:
4.10.0
